name: Forest Escape (itch)
description:
danger is lurking around every corner

You are a kid named Forest Firestick that wakes up in a forest in the middle of the night. You want to escape but there are monsters crawling in every corner. Will you make it out alive and with the same mind you had before?

WARNING: This game is extremely difficult.

Credits:
-SeventyFour Productions (Programming, 3D objects, 3D scenery, animation, spritework, level design)
-Bro. Three (Spritework)
-Riot (Soundtrack)
